errors.missingHeaderDetail: This operation is idempotent and it requires correct usage of Idempotency Key
errors.reuseDetail: This operation is idempotent and it requires correct usage of Idempotency Key. Idempotency Key MUST not be reused across different payloads of this operation.
errors.retriedTitle: A request is outstanding for this Idempotency-Key
errors.retriedDetail: A request with the same Idempotency-Key for the same operation is being processed or is outstanding.
